Key Match Events: Shadab Khan struck a 20-ball 50 to turn the game on its head.
Shaheen Afridi took three wickets and was the pick among the bowlers.
Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort with a 22-ball 52 and 2/16 in bowling.
Shaheen Shah Afridi's bowling figures were 3/14.
South Africa were set a revised target of 142 runs in 14 overs after the rain interruption.
Shaheen Afridi dismissed Quinton de Kock and Riley Rossouw.
Shadab Khan dismissed Temba Bavuma and Aiden Makram.
Tristan Stubbs and Heinrich Klaasen tried to chase the target but couldn't sustain the momentum.
David Miller was ruled out due to an injury.
Anrich Nortje was the most successful bowler for South Africa with figures of 4/41.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-curtailed and decided by the DLS method.
Pakistan moved up to the third spot in group 2 with 4 points.
South Africa continued to stay second in group 2 with 5 points.
The fate of Group 2 will be decided on the last day of the Super 12 Stage.
